problem_text_cn: M是△ABC的边BC的中点,AN是△ABC的外角平分线,BN⊥AN于点N,且AB=4,MN=2.8,则AC的长是()
problem_text_en: M is the midpoint of side BC of △ABC, AN is the bisector of exterior angle of △ABC, BN ⊥ AN is at point N, and AB = N_0, MN = N_1, then the length of AC is ()
raw_answer: 【解答】解:延长CA、BN交于点D,在△ANB和△AND中,≥ft\{\begin{array}{l}{∠{BAN}=∠{DAN}}\\{{AN}={AN}}\\{∠{ANB}=∠{AND}}\end{array}\right.\end{array}\right.,∴△ANB≌△AND(ASA)∴AD=AB=4,BN=ND,∵BN=ND,BM=MC,∴CD=2MN=5.6,则AC=CD-AD=1.6,
raw_comment: 本题考查的是三角形中位线定理、全等三角形的判定和性质,三角形的中位线平行于第三边,且等于第三边的一半．
